tool_description: Say hello to a world of information at your fingertips. Empower your research, content creation, and decision-making processes with our efficient and reliable Article Scraper Service. Don't let valuable data slip away - take the leap into seamless web scraping now!

api_list.name: Server Status
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://article-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com/user_geo_info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "article-scraper3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
